document.full_text: riot police stormed a pro-democracy rally on friday, leaving one man dead, injuring scores of other people and dispersing a 1,000-person tent camp with water cannons.
document.title: riot police in jordan clear camp of protesters
lines_and_colors: riot police stormed a pro-democracy rally on friday, leaving one man dead, injuring scores of other people and dispersing a 1,000-person tent camp with water cannons.
